meanings.sent1: The cat squeezed through the ginnel to explore the other side.
meanings.sent2: I took a shortcut through the ginnel to reach the market faster.
meanings.sent3: The ginnel was so narrow that even a squirrel would have to turn sideways to pass through.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of life, sometimes we find ourselves in a ginnel with no clear way out.
meanings.sent5: The ginnel was dark and mysterious, like a secret tunnel to another world.

meanings.definition: To walk or move quickly and energetically.
meanings.sent1: She ginnelled down the street to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent2: The children ginnelled around the playground, full of energy and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The puppy ginnelled after the ball, eager to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to ginnel by as we enjoyed the sunny afternoon in the park.
meanings.sent5: His heart ginnelled with excitement as he approached the finish line of the race.
